data.label: OpenVPN
data.description: OpenVPN 是一个功能齐全的开源 SSL VPN 解决方案，适用于各种配置，包括远程访问、站点到站点 VPN、Wi-Fi 安全性和企业级远程访问解决方案，具有负载均衡、故障转移和细粒度访问控制。OpenVPN 以复杂性为安全之敌为基本前提，提供了一种适合中小企业和企业市场的成本效益高、轻量级的替代方案。

data.label: OpenVPN
data.description: OpenVPN is a full-featured open-source SSL VPN solution that accommodates a wide range of configurations, including remote access, site-to-site VPNs, Wi-Fi security, and enterprise-scale remote access solutions with load balancing, failover, and fine-grained access-controls. Starting with the fundamental premise that complexity is the enemy of security, OpenVPN offers a cost-effective, lightweight alternative to other VPN technologies that is well-adapted for the SME and enterprise markets.
